hints.content:
To find the number of campers without sleeping bags, we start with the total number of $\purpleD{65}$ campers and subtract the $\maroonD{53}$ that did bring sleeping bags.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/412bbe16d75d99d47f83da8265cc37792e37b793)

$\purpleD{65}-\maroonD{53}= \blueE{\square}$

Let's subtract to find how many campers didn't bring sleeping bags.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/af69adf5c1983fde549d0204263b5cd11ad92e9d)

$\purpleD{65}-\maroonD{53}= \blueE{12}$
$\blueE{12}$ campers did not bring sleeping bags.

question.content:
There are $65$ campers at Fun Camp.  Only $53$ campers brought sleeping bags.  

**How many campers did not bring sleeping bags?**  

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] campers
